00040 extern unsigned char rxed_data;
00041 
00042 static unsigned char glcd_buffer[GLCD_Y_BYTES][GLCD_X_BYTES];
00043 static const unsigned char glcd_mask_array[8] = {0x01,0x02,0x04,0x08,0x10,0x20,0x40,0x80};
00044 
00045 void glcd_update_area(unsigned char x1, unsigned char x2, unsigned char y1, unsigned char y2)
00046 {
00047         glcd_set_address(x1,y1>>3);
00048         
00049         y1 = y1>>3;
00050         y2 = y2>>3;
00051         
00052         for (unsigned char y=y1;y<y2;y++)
00053                 for (unsigned char x=x1;x<x2;x++)
00054                         glcd_data_write(glcd_buffer[y][x]);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void glcd_update(unsigned int top, unsigned int bottom)
00058 {
00059         glcd_set_address(0,0);
00060 
00061         unsigned char yt, yb;
00062         
00063         yt = top >> 3;                          /* setup bytes of range */
00064         yb = bottom >> 3;
00065         
00066         for (unsigned char y=yt;y<yb;y++)
00067                 for (unsigned char x=0;x<GLCD_X_BYTES;x++)
00068                         glcd_data_write(glcd_buffer[y][x]);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void glcd_glyph(unsigned char left, unsigned char top, unsigned char width, unsigned char height, const prog_char *glyph, unsigned char store_width)
00072 {
00073         unsigned char bit_pos;
00074         unsigned char byte_offset;
00075         unsigned char y_bits;
00076         unsigned char remaining_bits;
00077         unsigned char mask;
00078         unsigned char char_mask;
00079         unsigned char x;
00080         const prog_char *glyph_scan;
00081         unsigned char glyph_offset;
00082 
00083         bit_pos = top & 0x07;           /* get the bit offset into a byte */
00084 
00085         glyph_offset = 0;                       /* start at left side of the glyph rasters */
00086         char_mask = 0x80;                       /* initial character glyph mask */
00087 
00088         for (x = left; x < (left + width); x++)
00089         {
00090                 byte_offset = top >> 3;         /* get the byte offset into y direction */
00091                 y_bits = height;                                /* get length in y direction to write */
00092                 remaining_bits = 8 - bit_pos;   /* number of bits left in byte */
00093                 mask = glcd_mask_array[bit_pos];        /* get mask for this bit */
00094                 glyph_scan = glyph + glyph_offset;       /* point to base of the glyph */
00095 
00096                 /* boundary checking here to account for the possibility of  */
00097                 /* write past the bottom of the screen.                        */
00098                 while((y_bits) && (byte_offset < GLCD_Y_BYTES)) /* while there are bits still to write */
00099                 {
00100                 /* check if the character pixel is set or not */
00101                         if(pgm_read_byte(glyph_scan) & char_mask)
00102                                         glcd_buffer[byte_offset][x] |= mask;    /* set image pixel */
00103                         else
00104                                         glcd_buffer[byte_offset][x] &= ~mask;   /* clear the image pixel */
00105 
00106                         if(glcd_mask_array[0] & 0x80)
00107                                 mask >>= 1;
00108                         else
00109                                 mask <<= 1;
00110                 
00111                         y_bits--;
00112                         remaining_bits--;
00113                         
00114                         if(remaining_bits == 0)
00115                         {
00116                                 /* just crossed over a byte boundry, reset byte counts */
00117                                 remaining_bits = 8;
00118                                 byte_offset++;
00119                                 mask = glcd_mask_array[0];
00120                         }
00121 
00122                 /* bump the glyph scan to next raster */
00123                         glyph_scan += store_width;
00124                 }
00125 
00126         /* shift over to next glyph bit */
00127         char_mask >>= 1;
00128         if(char_mask == 0)                              /* reset for next byte in raster */
00129         {
00130                 char_mask = 0x80;
00131                 glyph_offset++;
00132                 }
00133         }
00134 }
00135 
00136 void glcd_set_byte(unsigned char x, unsigned char y, unsigned char curr_byte) {
00137         glcd_buffer[y][x] = curr_byte;
00138 }
00139 
00140 void glcd_text(unsigned char left, unsigned char top, unsigned char font, char *str, unsigned char length)
00141 {
00142         unsigned char x = left;
00143         unsigned char glyph;
00144         unsigned char width;
00145         unsigned char height;
00146         unsigned char store_width;
00147         const prog_char *glyph_ptr;
00148 
00149         for (unsigned char count=0;count<length;count++) {
00150                 glyph = (unsigned char)*str;
00151 
00152                 /* check to make sure the symbol is a legal one */
00153                 /* if not then just replace it with the default character */
00154                 if((glyph < fonts[font].glyph_beg) || (glyph > fonts[font].glyph_end))
00155                 {
00156                         glyph = fonts[font].glyph_def;
00157                 }
00158 
00159                         /* make zero based index into the font data arrays */
00160                 glyph -= fonts[font].glyph_beg;
00161                 width = fonts[font].fixed_width;        /* check if it is a fixed width */
00162                 if(width == 0)
00163                         width=fonts[font].width_table[glyph];   /* get the variable width instead */
00164 
00165                 height = fonts[font].glyph_height;
00166                 store_width = fonts[font].store_width;
00167                 
00168                 glyph_ptr = fonts[font].glyph_table + ((unsigned int)glyph * (unsigned int)store_width * (unsigned int)height);
00169 
00170                 /* range check / limit things here */
00171                 if(x > GLCD_RIGHT)
00172                         x = GLCD_RIGHT;
00173                 if((x + width) > GLCD_RIGHT+1)
00174                         width = GLCD_RIGHT - x + 1;
00175                 if(top > GLCD_BOTTOM)
00176                         top = GLCD_BOTTOM;
00177                 if((top + height) > GLCD_BOTTOM+1)
00178                         height = GLCD_BOTTOM - top + 1;
00179 
00180                 glcd_glyph(x,top,width,height,glyph_ptr,store_width);  /* plug symbol into buffer */
00181 
00182                 x += width;                                                     /* move right for next character */
00183                 str++;                                                          /* point to next character in string */
00184         }
00185 }

00187 void glcd_clear_area(unsigned char x1, unsigned char x2, unsigned char y1, unsigned char y2)
00188 {
00189         y1 = y1>>3;
00190         y2 = y2>>3;
00191         
00192         for (unsigned char y=y1;y<y2;y++)
00193                 for (unsigned char x=x1;x<x2;x++)
00194                         glcd_buffer[y][x] = 0x00;
00195 }
00196 
00197 void glcd_set_dot(unsigned char x, unsigned char y, unsigned char mode) {
00198         unsigned char bitnum, bitmask, yByte;
00199         
00200         if ( (x>=GLCD_RIGHT) || (y>=GLCD_BOTTOM) ) return;
00201         
00202         yByte   = y >> 3; // / 8
00203         bitnum  = y & 0x07;
00204         bitmask = glcd_mask_array[bitnum];
00205         switch (mode) {
00206                 case GLCD_MODE_SET:
00207                         glcd_buffer[yByte][x] |= bitmask;
00208                         break;
00209                 case GLCD_MODE_CLEAR:
00210                         glcd_buffer[yByte][x] &= ~bitmask;
00211                         break;
00212                 case GLCD_MODE_XOR:
00213                         glcd_buffer[yByte][x] ^= bitmask;
00214                         break;
00215                 default: break;
00216         }
00217 }
00218 
00219 void glcd_invert_area(unsigned char x1, unsigned char x2, unsigned char y1, unsigned char y2)
00220 {
00221         for (unsigned char x=x1;x<=x2;x++)
00222                 for (unsigned char y=y1;y<=y2;y++)
00223                         glcd_set_dot(x,y,GLCD_MODE_XOR);
00224 }
00225 
00226 // draw line
00227 void glcd_line(unsigned char x1, unsigned char x2, unsigned char y)
00228 {
00229         for (unsigned char pos = x1;pos<=x2;pos++)
00230                 glcd_set_dot(pos,y,GLCD_MODE_SET);
00231 }
00232 
00233 // draw rectangle
00234 void glcd_rectangle(unsigned char x, unsigned char y, unsigned char a, unsigned char b)
00235 {
00236   unsigned char j;
00237 
00238   for (j = 0; j < a; j++) {
00239                 glcd_set_dot(x, y + j,GLCD_MODE_SET);
00240                 glcd_set_dot(x + b - 1, y + j,GLCD_MODE_SET);
00241         }
00242         
00243   for (j = 0; j < b; j++)       {
00244                 glcd_set_dot(x + j, y,GLCD_MODE_SET);
00245                 glcd_set_dot(x + j, y + a - 1,GLCD_MODE_SET);
00246         }
00247 }
00248 
00249 // draw circle
00250 void glcd_circle(unsigned char xcenter, unsigned char ycenter, unsigned char radius)
00251 {
00252   int tswitch, y, x = 0;
00253   unsigned char d;
00254 
00255   d = ycenter - xcenter;
00256   y = radius;
00257   tswitch = 3 - 2 * radius;
00258   while (x <= y) {
00259     glcd_set_dot(xcenter + x, ycenter + y,GLCD_MODE_SET);     glcd_set_dot(xcenter + x, ycenter - y,GLCD_MODE_SET);
00260     glcd_set_dot(xcenter - x, ycenter + y,GLCD_MODE_SET);     glcd_set_dot(xcenter - x, ycenter - y,GLCD_MODE_SET);
00261     glcd_set_dot(ycenter + y - d, ycenter + x,GLCD_MODE_SET); glcd_set_dot(ycenter + y - d, ycenter - x,GLCD_MODE_SET);
00262     glcd_set_dot(ycenter - y - d, ycenter + x,GLCD_MODE_SET); glcd_set_dot(ycenter - y - d, ycenter - x,GLCD_MODE_SET);
00263 
00264     if (tswitch < 0) tswitch += (4 * x + 6);
00265     else {
00266       tswitch += (4 * (x - y) + 10);
00267       y--;
00268     }
00269     x++;
00270   }
00271 }
00272 
00273 void glcd_invert()
00274 {
00275         for (unsigned char y=0;y<GLCD_Y_BYTES;y++)
00276                 for (unsigned char x=0;x<GLCD_X_BYTES;x++)
00277                         glcd_buffer[y][x] = ~glcd_buffer[y][x];
00278 }
00279 
00280 void glcd_clear(void)
00281 {
00282         memset(&glcd_buffer,0x00,GLCD_Y_BYTES*GLCD_X_BYTES);
00283 }
00284 
00285 void glcd_print_picture(void)
00286 {
00287         unsigned int i=0;
00288 
00289         for (unsigned char y=0;y<GLCD_Y_BYTES;y++)
00290                 for (unsigned char x=0;x<GLCD_X_BYTES;x++)
00291                 {
00292                         glcd_buffer[y][x] = pgm_read_byte(&openASC_logo[i]);
00293                         i++;
00294                 }
00295                         
00296         glcd_invert();
00297         glcd_update_all();
00298 }
